import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, LineChart, Line, ResponsiveContainer, } from "recharts" const InventoryManagement = () => { // Sample data for dashboard stats const dashboardStats = { totalPO: 150, finishedPO: 120, pendingPO: 30, totalClientOrders: 85, finishedClientOrders: 65, pendingClientOrders: 20, } // Sample data for order statistics chart const orderStatsData = [ { category: "Total PO", count: 150 }, { category: "Finished PO", count: 120 }, { category: "Pending PO", count: 30 }, { category: "Total Client Orders", count: 85 }, { category: "Finished Client Orders", count: 65 }, { category: "Pending Client Orders", count: 20 }, ] // Sample data for material quantities const materialQuantityData = [ { material: "Cement", quantity: 500 }, { material: "Steel Bars", quantity: 1200 }, { material: "Bricks", quantity: 8000 }, { material: "Sand", quantity: 300 }, { material: "Gravel", quantity: 250 }, { material: "Paint", quantity: 150 }, ] // Sample data for materials table const materialsTableData = [ { id: 1, material: "Cement (50kg bags)", quantity: 500, pendingQuantity: 50 }, { id: 2, material: "Steel Bars (12mm)", quantity: 1200, pendingQuantity: 0 }, { id: 3, material: "Red Bricks", quantity: 8000, pendingQuantity: 1000 }, { id: 4, material: "River Sand (cubic meters)", quantity: 300, pendingQuantity: 25 }, { id: 5, material: "Gravel (cubic meters)", quantity: 250, pendingQuantity: 0 }, { id: 6, material: "Wall Paint (liters)", quantity: 150, pendingQuantity: 20 }, { id: 7, material: "Concrete Blocks", quantity: 2000, pendingQuantity: 200 }, { id: 8, material: "Roofing Sheets", quantity: 80, pendingQuantity: 10 }, ] return (
